# Theme â€º About {#about}

Press Theme is built off Sage 9, which is a Wordpress boilerplate theme using Laravel (a PHP framework) as its backbone.

## Supported Plugins {#supported-plugins}

- Soil
- Yoast
- Gravity Forms
- ACF Pro

- Edge
- Chrome
- Firefox
- iOS
